result.eng: He should be home by now for he left this house an hour ago.

result.eng: I got down to writing the essay and I had it finished in two hours.

result.eng: Do you need two hours to prepare yourself in the morning?

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.

result.eng: I was waiting for an hour for a taxi.
